content: due to the overwhelming interest in this hat i have expanded the pattern to four sizes baby child adult small and adult large in addition there have also been some other tweaks including a change to a more traditional gauge for worsted weight yarn the original pattern is still available in the one size for those of you who liked it and there is now a second pdf with the new sizes and updated pattern sizes baby child adult small adult large 13in 16in 18 5in 21in 33cm 40cm 47cm 53cm
